name: Version 1.4.9
body: - actually fixed the docs building on rtd.com this time

name: Version 1.4.8
body:
- dealing with `h5py` install problems
- remove `np.int`
- update to sphinx 2 to fix doc builds
- other dependency updates
- added option to plot orbit and GP separately in GPMultipanel
- fixed up ability to specify x axis limits in the orbit plots

name: Version 1.4.7
body:
- fixed bug in EccentricityPrior
- remove legacy 'spec' override that was causing issues with Django.

name: Version 1.4.6
body: Minor update to requirements and docs to fix h5py issue on ReadTheDocs.org

name: Version 1.4.4
body: - minor release to catch new configparser.NoSectionErrors in driver.py

name: Version 1.4.3
body:
- fixed a few small typos and bugs in the documentation and tutorials
- update the Vector object when changing basis
- don't modify the posterior object when making plots
- fixed vector indexing bug

name: Version 1.4.2
body:
- use dill instead of pickle
- update `planet_parameters` with change of basis
- incorporate Paul's changes to draw_models_from_chain
- fixed model comparison bug that prevented table from building if there were nan values in it

name: Version 1.4.1
body:
- added ability to run in "headless" mode without printing the convergence statistics and progress
- fixed bug highlighted in issue #316

name: Version 1.4.0
body:
- vectorized likelihood calculations and basis conversions for ~20% performance enhancement
- added tutorial for creating custom likelihoods and performing a joint RV+light curve fit

name: Version 1.3.8
body: Hotfix for a bug in the reported lnprob values from MCMC. See PR #307 for details.

name: Version 1.3.7
body:
- make save and proceed flags boolean 0f96ac8
- more default colors in RV multipanel plots 70f068d
- fix reshaping bug in MCMC trend plot #299
- remove .tar from file extension since files are not tarred #298
- fix save/proceed bug with auto-adjusted number of walkers #296

name: Version 1.3.6
body:
- updating tutorials to explicitly import radvel.likelihood
- multipanel plot unit bugfixes

name: Version 1.3.5
body:
- bugfix for units on multipanel plot
- fix user-specified plot name with CLI

name: Version 1.3.4
body: - fixed a bug introduced in the previous release that broke some of the report tables

name: Version 1.3.3
body: - minor update to add Msini annotation to RV plot if derived parameters are calculated first

name: Version 1.3.2
body:
- changed some default convergence criteria
- fixed proceed bug
- posterior print function now subtracts time_base from time parameters instead of arbitrary offset
- fixed posterior loading bug to allow dependencies to be loaded in the setup file

name: Version 1.3.1
body:
- added --save and --proceed flags to radvel mcmc to allow saving and continuing runs!
- added table of convergence metrics to report
- fixed bug with chain reshaping for the trend plot
- fixed bug causing chains to reset their positions after every status check
- sped up the Kepler solver slightly by removing some of the trig calculations
- changed default thinning to 10
- added optional autocorrelation plot
- increased code coverage
- include Cython in setup_requires
- shrunk Docker testing image
- fixed statevars bug causing tests to fail

name: Version 1.3.0
body:
- upgrade to emcee3
- new autocorrelation-based convergence checks see (https://radvel.readthedocs.io/en/latest/autocorrintro.html)
- autocorrelation convergence plot
- testing in Docker containers

This version is no longer compatible with versions of `emcee` < 3.0.0. Please update your `emcee` install.

name: Version 1.2.13
body:
- update emcee requirement to prevent update to 3.0 (for now)
- fixed GP parameter formatting in output tables
- added a link to Tim Brandt's linearization trick into the docs

name: Version 1.2.12
body:
### This is the last version to officially support Python 2. I'm not doing anything to explicitly remove Python 2 compatibility (yet), but I'll be removing the Python 2.7 Travis tests in the next release because they no longer work. 

- added some documentation about the linear gamma trick
- bugfix in notebook tutorials
- fixed Mini function bug

name: Version 1.2.11
body:
- GeneralRVModel implemented by @shadden
- linearized gammas trick implemented and working, but not yet well-documented
- bugfix in Msini calculation when using it outside of radvel
- fixed report bug affecting systems with a mix of transiting and non-transiting planets
- added RMS to plot legend if the show_rms plot keyword is set
- circle last measurement in all panels in the rv_multipanel_plot if the highlight_last plot keyword is set

name: Version 1.2.9
body:
- perform proper Msini calculation when Mp > 10% of Mstar
- fixed some install bugs
- remove some deadwood
- fixed bug in utils.bintels

name: Version 1.2.8
body:
- removed jitter flipping hack
- fixed derived table bug that prevented it from generating from the radvel table command
- fixed mass units in derived table
- PEP8 cleanup (thanks @lgbouma!)

name: Version 1.2.7
body:
* informative baseline prior
* require latest NumPy
* dealing with jinja2 dependency security issue
* require NumPy >= 1.16
* revert to old minimizer parameters
* expose minimum percentage complete before convergence checks

name: Version 1.2.6
body:
* quick release to deal with install bug in v1.2.5 (update requirements)
* also deal with underscores in instrument names

name: Version 1.2.5
body:
* replaced `imp` with `importlib`
* added warnings and advise for HardBounds with non-finite boundaries
* adjusted MAP tolerances
* warning when Mp is not << Mstar
* tabulate GP and derived parameters in report
* doc fixes (maximum likelihood --> MAP, GP equations)
* fixed/suppressed most warnings
* PEP8 cleanup

name: Version 1.2.4
body:
- allow zero planet orbit plot
- fixed some import errors when running in python < 3

name: Version 1.2.1
body:
- Bugfixes for issues #193 and #197 and PR #194.
- Moved BIC and AIC methods into the Likelihood object. Previous code which calls the Posterior.bic()/aic() method will break.

name: Version 1.2.0
body:
- finalize the celerite approximate quasi-periodic GP kernel
- save MCMC stats in the .stat file

name: Version 1.1.12
body:
- plot labeling bugfix
- plotting tweaks
- display reduced chi^2
- fixed array ordering issues with multiprocessing in response to issue #182

name: Version 1.1.11
body:
- Minor bugfixes
- various table fixes
- add warning in AIC calculation with n_free == n_data
- worked out exact cython requirement

name: Version 1.1.10
body:
- radvel.plotting is now the subpackage radvel.plot. Each type of plot now has its own class and associated methods.
- This pull request addresses Issue #125, including the add-on issue about yscale_sigma
- This pull request also addresses Issue #121, adding three new keywords specifically for GP Multipanel plots.
- Assorted small changes made to the way the multipanel plotting code runs.
- Incorporates a couple of extensions to the table code. 
- prior & GP normalizations
- additional keywords for multipanel plot

name: Version 1.1.9
body:
- added AIC to comparison tables
- added several more types of model comparisons (see pull request #165)

name: Version 1.1.8
body:
- switch back to Powell minimizer and expose as an option in response to issue #164
- removed most deepcopy calls in response to issue #166
- made celerite an optional dependency in response to issue #162
- fixed bug in celerite setup file

name: Version 1.1.7
body:
- use jinja2 templating for LaTeX report
- fixed output directory bug reported in issue #158

name: Version 1.1.6
body:
- Bugfix for posterior.residuals method
- ReadTheDocs bugfix

name: Version 1.1.5
body:
- added celerite GP kernel
- added new example using the celerite kernel
- added .readthedocs.yml and separate requirements file for RTD
- added numerical prior

name: Version 1.1.3
body:
- Minor bugfixes for Travis testing
- MCMC bugfix

name: Version 1.1.2
body:
- more default plot symbols
- adding thin option for MCMC
- semi-major axis calculation
- docstring cleanup
- PEP8 cleanup

name: Version 1.1.1
body:
- "logper e w look" basis
- RV data table
- calculate mass ratio (musini)

name: Version 1.1.0
body:
- Added GP capabilities
- fixed negative stellar mass bug
- fixed secondary eclipse time wrapping bug
- use miniconda for Travis CI testing

name: Version 1.0.5
body:
- response to referee report
- exposed MCMC options to user

name: Version 1.0.4
body:
- Renamed "cps" basis to "synth" basis
- fixed period rounding error on plots
- PEP8 cleanup
- paper submitted

name: Version 1.0.3
body:
- update README
- implemented secondary eclipse prior
- added logper secosw sesinw logk basis
- establish default planet_letters so that this is now optional in the setup files
- minor bugfixes
- PEP8 cleanup

name: Version 1.0.2
body:
- added MIT license
- fixed RTD doc building bug (see issue #101)
- some PEP8 cleanup
- minor doc corrections

name: Version 1.0.1
body:
- Minor bugfixes (primarily in response to issue #99)
- Minor updates to advanced usage API documentation

name: Version 1.0.0
body:
- Major API  changes to RVParameters (now Parameters) object (your setup files will need to change).
- Python 3 compatibility and Python 2 backwards-compatibility.
- Incorporate CI w/ Travis, coverage with coveralls, and health w/ landscape

name: Version 0.9.8
body: Bugfixes and adding units to derived plot. This will be the last release that is not compatible with Python 3.

name: Version 0.9.7
body: MCMC bugfix and fixed pip install on Linux

name: Version 0.9.5
body:
- BIC calculation bugfix
- added log(period) basis
- fixed Jupiter notebook examples

name: Minor Bug Fixes
body: Various bug fixes and error catching

name: First Release
body: First release of the RadVel radial velocity fitting toolkit

name: First Beta Release
body: First release of the RadVel package.
